title: Implement secure login feature
description: As a user, I want to securely log in to the portal, so that I can access my account with confidence that my credentials are protected.
attributes_and_rules: Secure login must use encrypted credential storage and enforce strong password policies.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to log in securely using their credentials.
test_cases: Given valid credentials, When the user logs in, Then they should be granted access.

title: Implement multi-factor authentication
description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure even if my password is compromised.
attributes_and_rules: Multi-factor authentication should support both SMS and email verification codes.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to enable and use multi-factor authentication.
test_cases: Given valid credentials and a verification code, When the user logs in, Then they should be granted access.

title: Implement session management and timeout controls
description: As a user, I want my sessions to be managed securely, so that I am automatically logged out after inactive sessions for security purposes.
attributes_and_rules: Sessions should time out after a period of inactivity, sending users back to the login screen.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be automatically logged out after a period of inactivity.
test_cases: Given an inactive session, When the timeout period is reached, Then the user should be automatically logged out.

title: Create a personalized dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant financial information and product offerings based on my profile.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should display accounts, balances, and personalized product offerings.
acceptance_criteria: Users should see a personalized dashboard when they log in.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display relevant financial information and product offerings.

title: Ensure quick access options on dashboard
description: As a user, I want quick access options on my dashboard, so that I can perform common tasks easily.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should include quick access options for common actions like transferring money and viewing statements.
acceptance_criteria: Users should have quick access options available on their dashboard.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When the user views the dashboard, Then quick access options should be present for common tasks.

title: Design a responsive mobile-first UI
description: As a user, I want a mobile-first user interface, so that I can access the portal seamlessly on any device.
attributes_and_rules: The user interface should automatically adapt to different screen sizes while maintaining usability and functionality.
acceptance_criteria: The UI should be responsive and function well on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
test_cases: Given different screen sizes, When the user accesses the portal, Then the UI should automatically adjust to fit the screen.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Flows
title: Implement guided account opening workflow
description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for opening accounts, so that I can complete the process with minimal input and clear steps.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow should be clear, concise, and include validation and auto-fill features.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to open new accounts through a guided workflow.
test_cases: Given a user input, When the user follows the account opening workflow, Then they should be able to successfully open an account.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Flows
title: Implement guided service modification workflow
description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for modifying services, so that I can update my services efficiently with clear guidance.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow should provide clear, concise steps and support validation and auto-fill features.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to modify existing services through a guided workflow.
test_cases: Given a user input, When the user follows the service modification workflow, Then they should be able to successfully modify a service.

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
title: Enable document uploads for account openings
description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documents during account openings, so that I can complete my application process seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: The upload feature should support secure transmission and validate file types and sizes.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to upload documents securely during account openings.
test_cases: Given valid document types and sizes, When the user uploads documents, Then they should be successfully attached to the account opening application.

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
title: Enable saving of application drafts
description: As a user, I want to save my application as a draft, so that I can complete it later at my convenience.
attributes_and_rules: The draft saving feature should allow users to save, retrieve, and resume draft applications.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to save and resume their applications as drafts.
test_cases: Given a partially completed application, When the user saves it as a draft, Then they should be able to retrieve and complete it later.

title: Implement real-time request tracking
description: As a user, I want to track my submitted requests in real-time, so that I can stay informed about their status.
attributes_and_rules: The portal should have a dedicated section for request tracking with real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to track the real-time status of their submitted requests.
test_cases: Given a submitted request, When the user checks the status, Then they should see the real-time update in the tracking section.

title: Implement automated notifications
description: As a user, I want to receive automated notifications for request status changes, so that I am updated without having to check manually.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications should be sent via email and in-app alerts.
acceptance_criteria: Users should receive notifications for changes in request status.
test_cases: Given a status change in a request, When it triggers a notification, Then the user should receive an email and in-app alert.

title: Maintain a user interaction history
description: As a user, I want to see a history of my interactions, so that I can track my past activities on the portal.
attributes_and_rules: The history should display timestamps, actions, and relevant details.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to view a detailed interaction history.
test_cases: Given user interactions, When the user views the history section, Then they should see a detailed list of past activities.

title: Enable compliance-friendly audit logging
description: As an administrator, I want a robust audit logging system, so that we can maintain compliance with regulatory requirements.
attributes_and_rules: Audit logs should capture timestamps, user details, and activity metadata securely.
acceptance_criteria: Audit logs should comprehensively record user and system interactions for compliance.
test_cases: Given user interactions, When the administrator views audit logs, Then they should see detailed and secure records of all activities.

title: Integrate portal with core banking systems
description: As a user, I want the portal to be integrated with the bankâ€™s core systems, so that my data and requests are synchronized in real-time.
attributes_and_rules: The integration should support real-time data exchange with minimal latency.
acceptance_criteria: The portal should seamlessly integrate with core banking systems for real-time data synchronization.
test_cases: Given a user request, When the data is exchanged, Then it should be synchronized in real-time with core banking systems.

title: Develop an independent portal database
description: As a database administrator, I want a high-performance database for the portal, so that operations are fast, secure, and scalable.
attributes_and_rules: The database should support fast read-write operations and ensure secure and scalable storage.
acceptance_criteria: The portal database should be high-performance and secure, supporting fast operations and scalability.
test_cases: Given high traffic, When database operations are performed, Then they should be fast and secure.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: As an administrator, I want to define and enforce access permissions based on user roles, so that data protection and governance compliance are maintained.
attributes_and_rules: RBAC should restrict access to specific products, services, and system functions according to user profiles.
acceptance_criteria: Access permissions should be enforceable based on user roles and profiles.
test_cases: Given a user role, When access is requested, Then rights should be enforced to interact with appropriate features only.
